title: Beyond the Farthest Star
synopsis: The USS Enterprise encounters a powerful, malevolent alien entity that threatens to destroy the ship and its crew.

title: Yesteryear
synopsis: Spock travels back in time to his childhood and must alter the past to ensure his own survival and future.

title: One of Our Planets Is Missing
synopsis: The crew must stop a giant space cloud that is consuming planets, threatening the entire galaxy.

title: The Lorelei Signal
synopsis: The Enterprise is lured into a trap by a group of powerful, beautiful aliens who drain the crew's energy.

title: More Tribbles, More Troubles
synopsis: The crew encounters a new batch of tribbles, which cause chaos on the ship and lead to a new crisis.

title: The Survivor
synopsis: The Enterprise discovers a mysterious man who claims to be a famous diplomat and may hold the key to a vital mission.

title: The Infinite Vulcan
synopsis: The crew encounters a scientist who has developed a device that could duplicate anyone, leading to unforeseen consequences.

title: The Magicks of Megas-Tu
synopsis: The Enterprise visits a planet where magic is real and the crew must deal with strange and fantastical forces.

title: Once Upon a Planet
synopsis: The crew returns to a planet they visited before and finds it under threat from a powerful entity.

title: Mudd's Passion
synopsis: Harry Mudd returns with a new scheme involving a potion that causes people to fall in love with him, leading to chaos.

title: The Time Trap
synopsis: The Enterprise becomes trapped in a spatial anomaly and must find a way to escape while dealing with internal conflicts.

title: The Ambergris Element
synopsis: The crew must adapt to life underwater on a planet where the atmosphere has been contaminated by a powerful substance.

title: The Slaver Weapon
synopsis: The Enterprise encounters remnants of a powerful alien race and must prevent their advanced weaponry from falling into the wrong hands.

title: The Pirates of Orion
synopsis: The crew battles space pirates who are threatening trade routes and must find a way to stop their attacks.

title: The Deep Sleep
synopsis: The Enterprise crew encounters a race of beings who can put others into a deep sleep and must navigate their dangerous abilities.

title: The Jihad
synopsis: The crew is caught up in a galactic quest involving a powerful artifact that could alter the balance of power in the galaxy.

title: The Eye of the Beholder
synopsis: The Enterprise discovers an enigmatic being with the power to manipulate reality, leading to a series of surreal and dangerous encounters.

title: The Great Vegetable Rebellion
synopsis: The crew deals with a planet where plants have gained sentience and are rebelling against their human oppressors.

title: The Counter-Clock Incident
synopsis: The Enterprise encounters a time anomaly that causes events to occur in reverse, challenging the crew to find a way to restore normalcy.
